full_summary:
### Tender Notice
 ***Fabrication of Sling Baskets***
#### Solicitation Number: WS3933030696

___English and French Version AvailableBelow___


### Contract Description
This notice invites contractors to submit tenders for the fabrication of four (4) 4ft x 8ft and three (3) helicopter sling baskets to be supplied to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans.


### Contract Specifications

The contract involves the fabrication of the following sling baskets from marine grade 6061-T6 aluminum:

* Four (4) 4ft x 8ft helicopter sling baskets
* Three (3) 4ft x 4ft helicopter sling baskets

The specifications of the sling baskets are provided below:

| Category | Description | Quantity |
|----------|-------------|----------|
| Sling Baskets | 4ft x 8ft marine grade 6061-T6 aluminum | 4 |
| Sling Baskets | 4ft x 4ft marine grade 6061-T6 aluminum | 3 |

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: January 16, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Time (ET)
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 30, 2023 (End date will be determined based on needs)

### Contract Award

The contract will be awarded to the lowest bidder, as per the trade agreements listed below:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contract Contact

 Contractors are encouraged to contact the following person if they have questions or clarifications:

* Matthew Furlong, Technical Pocurement Analyst
  Email: [matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

The full notice of tender description is available on the Ariba platform: 
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18167815?extsite=MTgxNjc4MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
```
Response guidelines:
- professional technical writing techniques and formatting are expected. 
- make sure your otherwise plethora of code cringe descriptions are actually properly formatted in Markdown. 
- cut any unnecessary information. 
- try at all cost not to use the English/French dual-sided thing I had in the code.
- Blue bold indicate departure from the original instructions; breakdowns should help explain why the change may have happened in other formats
